arguments.template:
<lux-form-control
  [luxFormComponent]="this"
  [luxHideBottomBorder]="true"
  [formGroup]="formGroup"
  [luxIgnoreDefaultLabel]="true"
  (click)="formControl.markAsTouched()"
  *ngIf="formGroup"
>
  <mat-checkbox
    [formControl]="formControl"
    [disableRipple]="true"
    [required]="luxRequired"
    luxTagIdHandler
    [luxTagId]="luxTagId"
    [id]="uid"
    [luxAriaDescribedby]="uid + '-error ' + uid + '-hint'"
    luxAriaDescribedbySelector=".mat-checkbox-input"
    [luxAriaRequired]="luxRequired"
    luxAriaRequiredSelector=".mat-checkbox-input"
    [luxAriaInvalid]="formControl.invalid"
    luxAriaInvalidSelector=".mat-checkbox-input"
    (focusin)="luxFocusIn.emit($event)"
    (focusout)="luxFocusOut.emit($event)"
    tabIndex="{{ luxReadonly ? -1 : 0 }}"
  >
    <label class="lux-form-label" [for]="uid + '-input'" *ngIf="formLabelComponent || luxLabel">
      <ng-container *ngIf="luxLabel; else formLabelTemplate">
        {{ luxLabel }}
      </ng-container>
      <ng-template #formLabelTemplate>
        <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="formLabelComponent.templateRef"></ng-container>
      </ng-template>
      {{ luxRequired ? ' *' : '' }}
    </label>
  </mat-checkbox>
</lux-form-control>

arguments.template:
<lux-form-control
  [luxFormComponent]="this"
  [luxHideBottomBorder]="true"
  [luxScalableHeight]="true"
  [formGroup]="formGroup"
  *ngIf="formGroup"
>
  <mat-radio-group
    luxTagIdHandler
    [luxTagId]="luxTagId"
    [name]="luxGroupName"
    [formControl]="formControl"
    fxLayoutGap="10px"
    [ngClass]="{ 'lux-vertical': isVertical, 'lux-horizontal': !isVertical }"
    fxLayout="{{ isVertical ? 'column' : 'row wrap' }}"
    fxLayoutAlign="start stretch"
    [required]="luxRequired"
    (focusin)="luxFocusIn.emit($event)"
    (focusout)="luxFocusOut.emit($event)"
    [luxAriaLabelledby]="uid + '-label'"
    [id]="uid"
  >
    <mat-radio-button
      [value]="luxPickValue ? luxPickValue(option) : option"
      [disableRipple]="true"
      fxFlex="0 0 auto"
      [luxAriaDescribedby]="uid + '-error ' + uid + '-hint'"
      luxAriaDescribedbySelector=".mat-radio-input"
      [luxAriaRequired]="luxRequired"
      luxAriaRequiredSelector=".mat-radio-input"
      [luxAriaInvalid]="formControl.invalid"
      luxAriaInvalidSelector=".mat-radio-input"
      *ngFor="let option of luxOptions"
    >
      <ng-container
        *ngTemplateOutlet="
          tempRef && !luxOptionLabelProp ? tempRef : noTemplateRefTemplate;
          context: { $implicit: option }
        "
      ></ng-container>
    </mat-radio-button>
  </mat-radio-group>
  <ng-content select="lux-form-hint"></ng-content>
</lux-form-control>

<ng-template #noTemplateRefTemplate let-option>
  <ng-container *ngIf="option && option[luxOptionLabelProp]; else showObjectTemplate">
    {{ option | luxRenderProperty: luxOptionLabelProp }}
  </ng-container>
  <ng-template #showObjectTemplate>
    <ng-container *ngIf="!!option">
      {{ option }}

arguments.template:
<lux-form-control [luxFormComponent]="this" [formGroup]="formGroup" *ngIf="formGroup">
  <mat-select
    luxTagIdHandler
    [luxTagId]="luxTagId"
    [placeholder]="luxPlaceholder"
    [multiple]="luxMultiple"
    [compareWith]="compareObjects"
    [required]="luxRequired"
    [formControl]="formControl"
    [attr.aria-invalid]="formControl.invalid"
    [attr.aria-required]="luxRequired"
    [id]="uid"
    [panelClass]="'lux-select-panel'"
    [luxAriaLabelledby]="uid + '-label'"
    [luxAriaDescribedby]="uid + '-error ' + uid + '-hint'"
    (focusin)="luxFocusIn.emit($event)"
    (focusout)="luxFocusOut.emit($event)"
  >
    <mat-option *ngFor="let item of luxOptions" [value]="luxPickValue ? luxPickValue(item) : item">
      <ng-container
        *ngTemplateOutlet="
          tempRef && !luxOptionLabelProp ? tempRef : noTemplateRefTemplate;
          context: { $implicit: item }
        "
      >
      </ng-container>
    </mat-option>
  </mat-select>
</lux-form-control>

<ng-template #noTemplateRefTemplate let-option>
  <ng-container *ngIf="option && option[luxOptionLabelProp]; else showObjectTemplate">
    {{ option | luxRenderProperty: luxOptionLabelProp }}
  </ng-container>
  <ng-template #showObjectTemplate>
    <ng-container *ngIf="!!option">
      {{ option }}
    </ng-container>
  </ng-template>
</ng-template>

arguments.template:
<lux-form-control
  [luxFormComponent]="this"
  [luxHideBottomBorder]="true"
  [formGroup]="formGroup"
  [luxScalableHeight]="luxVertical"
  *ngIf="formGroup"
>
  <mat-slider
    luxTagIdHandler
    [luxTagId]="luxTagId"
    [color]="luxColor"
    [invert]="luxInvert"
    [max]="luxMax"
    [min]="luxMin"
    [step]="luxStep"
    [thumbLabel]="luxShowThumbLabel"
    [tickInterval]="luxTickInterval"
    [vertical]="luxVertical"
    [value]="luxValue"
    [displayWith]="luxDisplayWith"
    (change)="onChange($event)"
    (input)="onInput($event)"
    [formControl]="formControl"
    [ngClass]="{
      'lux-show-thumb-label-always': luxShowThumbLabelAlways && luxShowThumbLabel,
      'lux-thumb-label-1k': luxValue >= 1000,
      'lux-thumb-label-10k': luxValue >= 10000
    }"
    [id]="uid"
    [luxAriaDescribedby]="uid + '-error ' + uid + '-hint'"
    [luxAriaInvalid]="formControl.invalid"
    [luxAriaRequired]="luxRequired"
    [luxAriaLabel]="luxLabel"
    tabIndex="{{ luxReadonly ? -1 : 0 }}"
  >
  </mat-slider>
</lux-form-control>

arguments.template:
<lux-form-control
  [luxFormComponent]="this"
  [luxHideBottomBorder]="true"
  [formGroup]="formGroup"
  [luxIgnoreDefaultLabel]="true"
  (click)="formControl.markAsTouched()"
  *ngIf="formGroup"
>
  <mat-slide-toggle
    luxTagIdHandler
    [luxTagId]="luxTagId"
    [disableRipple]="true"
    [required]="luxRequired"
    [formControl]="formControl"
    (focusin)="luxFocusIn.emit($event)"
    (focusout)="luxFocusOut.emit($event)"
    [id]="uid"
    [luxAriaDescribedby]="uid + '-error ' + uid + '-hint'"
    luxAriaDescribedbySelector=".mat-slide-toggle-input"
    [luxAriaRequired]="luxRequired"
    luxAriaRequiredSelector=".mat-slide-toggle-input"
    [luxAriaInvalid]="formControl.invalid"
    luxAriaInvalidSelector=".mat-slide-toggle-input"
    tabIndex="{{ luxReadonly ? -1 : 0 }}"
  >
    <label class="lux-form-label" [for]="uid + '-input'" *ngIf="formLabelComponent || luxLabel">
      <ng-container *ngIf="luxLabel; else formLabelTemplate">
        {{ luxLabel }}
      </ng-container>
      <ng-template #formLabelTemplate>
        <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="formLabelComponent.templateRef"></ng-container>
      </ng-template>
      {{ luxRequired ? ' *' : '' }}
    </label>
  </mat-slide-toggle>
</lux-form-control>

arguments.template:
<lux-dialog-structure *ngIf="data">
  <lux-dialog-title>
    {{ data.title }}
  </lux-dialog-title>
  <lux-dialog-content>
    <ng-container *ngIf="data.contentTemplate">
      <ng-container *ngTemplateOutlet="data.contentTemplate"></ng-container>
    </ng-container>
    <ng-container *ngIf="data.content && !data.contentTemplate">
      {{ data.content }}
    </ng-container>
  </lux-dialog-content>
  <lux-dialog-actions fxLayout="row wrap" fxLayoutAlign="end center" fxLayoutGap="8px grid">
    <lux-button
      class="lux-mr-3 lux-dialog-preset-decline"
      luxTabIndex="0"
      [luxPotentialChildren]="['button']"
      [luxLabel]="data.declineAction.label"
      [luxColor]="data.declineAction.color"
      [luxRaised]="data.declineAction.raised"
      [luxIconName]="data.declineAction.iconName"
      [luxTagId]="data.declineAction.tagId"
      [luxDisabled]="data.declineAction.disabled"
      [luxRounded]="data.declineAction.rounded"
      (luxClicked)="onDeclineClick()"
      *ngIf="data.declineAction"
    >
    </lux-button>
    <lux-button
      class="lux-mr-3 lux-dialog-preset-confirm"
      luxTabIndex="0"
      [luxPotentialChildren]="['button']"
      [luxLabel]="data.confirmAction.label"
      [luxColor]="data.confirmAction.color"
      [luxRaised]="data.confirmAction.raised"
      [luxIconName]="data.confirmAction.iconName"
      [luxTagId]="data.confirmAction.tagId"
      [luxDisabled]="data.confirmAction.disabled"
      [luxRounded]="data.confirmAction.rounded"
      (luxClicked)="onConfirmClick()"
      *ngIf="data.confirmAction"
    >
    </lux-button>
  </lux-dialog-actions>
</lux-dialog-structure>
